content: When Non-Void finally falls to your assault, you'll be able to absorb the Non-Void Spirit.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Non-Void'.
The content is as follows:
When Non-Void finally falls to your assault, you'll be able to absorb the Non-Void Spirit.
